title: Name Change???
body:
so basically I want a different summoner's name. I made mine fast in a panic cause my friends were in a skype call with me telling me to hurry up so they can start teaching me (I've been playing for about a month now). 

Normally I'd just make a new profile and work from there but the thing is I've spent money on this game and don't want all that to go to waste So I'm just wondering if there's some process I can do to change my name.

replies.body: You can purchase a summoner name change in the store for either 13900 IP or I think 1300 RP.

It looks like Zombiemaster and Melloi got you covered!  Indeed, it's possible to change your summoner name through the store!  I think you have a pretty awesome name!  

I'm just imagining a mythical ram bouncing from asteroid to asteroid, and rainbows trailing behind him.  His big horns charge blue and allows him to traverse at faster than light speeds.  All he ever wanted was to create a constellation.   

Welcome to League of Legends and congrats on 30!

Hi,
Currently you can only change your Summoner Name by purchasing a name change through the client store for 1 300 Riot Points or 13 900 Influence Points. You can find the feature by clicking the Account button in the store (the profile with a gear behind it). The change will take effect after you exit and log back into the client. Any more information regarding Summoner Name can be found [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ).
